comment.author: 56428209@N00
comment._content: This is misidentified; the Chattahoochie River in Atlanta is not navigable by vessels of this size.  I suspect this is the Ohio River because of the name of the steamboat pictured.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Hi there,
Thanks for your help.  The Documerica photos came to us with these captions, so we are looking into correcting the mistake

Kristin
U.S. National Archives

comment.author: 33427085@N00
comment._content: This is indeed Louisville, KY. The bridges from closest to farthest away are the Big Four Railroad Bridge, the Kennedy Bridge (I-65) and the Clark Memorial Bridge. And, of course, the Belle of Louisville.
